summary: Scientists have predicted that another pandemic is likely. They've identified the viruses that might cause it—although the Department of Health and Human Services told us that few antiviral drugs for those viruses have been approved or are in HHS-funded clinical trials. Our panel of experts suggested several ways for policymakers to incentivize the development of these antiviral drugs, such as research grants or commitments to...
title: Antiviral Drugs: Economic Incentives and Strategies for Pandemic Preparedness [Reissued with revisions on Sept. 29, 2023]
